Package it.polimi.se2019.view

Class ConcreteViewReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • it.polimi.se2019.view.ConcreteViewReceiver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewReceiverInterface, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote
    public class ConcreteViewReceiver
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements ViewReceiverInterface
    Concrete class that receives updates from model. The updates get parsed and the relative linkedView gets modified accordingly.
    See Also:

                                int marksAmount)
                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Add damages and marks to receiver ViewPlayer Expect to have effective damages and marks that don't go over damages/marks limit. For instance an attack with 3 damages to a player with already 10 damages would throw an exception

                               java.util.ArrayList<ViewWeapon> loadedWeapons,
                               java.lang.String currentPlayerId)
